map.goldenFleeceDescription: Located in Kutaisi, 4.9 km from WhiteBridge, Hotel Golden Fleece provides accommodation with a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a terrace and a bar
map.cakeClubDescription: Сonfectionery Cake club is the best taste of traditional pastries made only from natural ingredients.
map.shedevriDescription: Shedevri offers you Georgian, traditional dishes, high quality, and guarantees the best taste!
map.tomasDescription: This is family winery, where already 50 year we are doing wine by our family technologies.
map.youthParkDescription: Youth park is 3.5 km south from Colchis fountain along Chavchavadze avenue. Circumference is 1.4 km. Large by Kutaisi standards and excellent for running and to some extent cycling.
map.tennisCourtDescription: A modern sports complex for adults and children (4+), where all the necessary conditions for a full-fledged training process of a tennis player are created.
map.shengeliaStadiumDescription: It is a multi-use stadium in Kutaisi, used mostly for football matches. It is the home stadium of FC Torpedo Kutaisi. The stadium is able to hold 12,000 people.

bookingBlock.subTitle: Reservations
bookingBlock.description: Book your escape to Grand Forest Metsovo today
bookingBlock.text: Book direct for the best price, exclusive offers and no hidden fees.
bookingBlock.bestPriceGuaranteeDescription: Book direct and enjoy the lowest rates available!
bookingBlock.exclusiveOffersDescription: Book direct and enjoy exclusive offers
bookingBlock.noHiddenFeesDescription: Many websites charge extra fees for bookings, we do not.

mainPage.aboutHotelText: This property features a restaurant, free private parking, a seasonal outdoor pool and a bar. It offers family rooms and a terrace. It offers a 24-hour front desk, a shuttle service, a shared kitchen and free Wi-Fi.

roomsPage.title: Rooms
roomsPage.description: With breathtaking views, exceptional design inspired by nature and sumptuous amenities – our premium mountain suites offer a memorable experience unlike anywhere else in Greece.

roomInfo.singleRoomDescription: Wake up to the breathtaking beauty of the Pindus mountains.
roomInfo.doubleRoomDescription: Wake up to the breathtaking beauty of the Pindus mountains.
roomInfo.twinRoomDescription: Wake up to the breathtaking beauty of the Pindus mountains.

aboutUsPage.title: About us
aboutUsPage.description: Some places are so good to stay in, you don’t want to generate a rush on them. The Grand Forest hotel in Metsovo is one of them.
aboutUsPage.subtitle: Services
aboutUsPage.gastronomyDescription: Experience modern local dishes and breathtaking views at our signature restaurant, Metsovo 1350m, where the menu is created by executive consultant chef Gikas Xenakis.
aboutUsPage.experienceDescription: All of our experiences are tailored to each individual guest – ensuring you’ll remember them for a lifetime. From skiing to wild truffle hunting, the surrounding landscape offers an array of activities for all four seasons.
aboutUsPage.spaDescription: Discover tranquillity beyond compare at the Fountus Spa, where wellness is generously offered in an elegant environment.

bookingPage.title: Booking
bookingPage.bookingText: Book direct for the best price, exclusive offers and no hidden fees.
